# none

**Type Property**

Disables managed CloudKit sync.

## Declaration

```swift
static var none: ModelConfiguration.CloudKitDatabase { get }
```

## Getting discovery options

- **automatic**: Enables managed CloudKit sync using the primary ubiquity container from the app’s entitlements.
- **private(_:)**: Enables managed CloudKit sync using the specified ubiquity container.

items.description: Enables managed CloudKit sync using the primary ubiquity container from the app’s entitlements.
items.name: automatic

items.description: Enables managed CloudKit sync using the specified ubiquity container.
